text: Beyond data privacy, the committee wants the antitrust regulator to look into Facebook, as they say Facebook uses its market dominance to crush rivals….
author: Hadas_Gold

text: They accuse Mark Zuckerberg of contempt for not showing up to their hearings… and they say Facebook deliberately sent execs who weren’t fully briefed on the matters so they couldn’t answer properly...
author: Hadas_Gold

text: The biggest takeaway: the committee claims Facebook has "intentionally and knowingly" violated both data privacy and competition laws. (Facebook denies this)….

text: We are done with our marathon day with government expert Shapiro. It was clear he’s done this before and was not rattled by Petrocelli trying to poke holes in his analysis - still some questions from Leon about it all - who noted it was “not intuitive”
author: Hadas_Gold

text: Lots of metaphors today about crystal balls, binoculars, microscopes and telescopes to describe these attempts to predict the changes to the industry #USvsATT
author: Hadas_Gold

text: Shapiro said his analysis is looking at long term changes to the industry - those long term contracts expire at some point though Petrocelli notes no one knows what world will look like then
author: Hadas_Gold

text: On cross examination of Prof Shapiro - Petrocelli notes Shapiro analysis doesn’t account for longterm contracts still in place - just one of those contracts which goes on for years, when put into Shapiro analysis takes away vast majority of price increase Shapiro estimated
author: Hadas_Gold

text: While we listen to arguments in the #USvsATT upstairs - a placard about another big AT&T case argued here years ago is downstairs
author: Hadas_Gold

text: Also sort of funny moment when Leon asked about decline in traditional pay TV subscribers asked aren’t most of them old and just dying off?
author: Hadas_Gold

text: Out for lunch during #USvsATT - in Shapiro analysis he assumes that negotiators for atener distribution will act in AT&T interest - but Leon pointed out NBC exec said Comcast has never told them to negotiated in Comcast cable interest
author: Hadas_Gold
